Lost City: A View From 1978

Mar 28, 2010

via lostnewyorkcity.blogspot.com I recently heard Julie Hayden’s “Day-Old Baby Rats” on the New Yorker Fiction Podcast. It got me thinking about NY in the 70s, when I was a kid. I’m not nostalgic about that time — I remember the smell of stale piss in the subways — but I do feel that the NY I remember is somehow “lost.” So I was happy to see these pictures which evoke that time as well as the story did.
